capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall, and I think it's really interesting that she has a pure-blood wizard lineage. It's not surprising to me that she does, given her background and the values of the Hogwarts school.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's an excellent educator and leader, and I've always admired her dedication to the school and its students.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit intimidating with his tall-and-burly physique. I've noticed that about him before, and it's definitely one of the first things that comes to mind when I think of him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.
